metaData.label: Video Conference
metaData.criteriaDescription: Event ID equal Event ID AND ( Event Type equal Adobe OR Event Type equal ADM OR Event Type equal Physical OR Event Type equal 3rd Party OR Event Type equal ON24 OR Event Type equal TEAMS )

triggers.name: J_OE_Reminder_1_Week-TEST
triggers.description: Status Event Registered is True AND Email Address begins with joost.van.driessche AND Event ID equal Event ID

configurationArguments.criteria: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="ContactToOnlineEvent.Status Event Registered" Operator="Is" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"94afae39-e9b9-e911-a2d5-1402ec938a88"}"><Value><![CDATA[true]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="ContactToOnlineEvent.Email Address" Operator="Begins" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"94afae39-e9b9-e911-a2d5-1402ec938a88"}"><Value><![CDATA[joost.van.driessche]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="OnlineEvent.Event ID" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"94afae39-e9b9-e911-a2d5-1402ec938a88"}" ValueIsReference="true"><AttributePath RelationshipID="5afda365-e9b9-e911-a2d5-1402ec938a88"><Value><![CDATA[STG_EventStartsIn1Week.Event ID]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
